overview:
Selectra represents a very strong software capability, specializing exclusively in the following fields:

â€¢ Software development â€¢ Telecommunications â€¢ IT consulting â€¢ IT services

Selectra Ltd owns and operates a feature rich working solution, which guarantees the project delivery. We have successfully developed many projects for our respective customers. Some of them are Ericson, Libertel, Euroglass, Telforth, Seversten Consulting, etc. Selectra is constantly developing its activities to respond to the requirements of its clients. Thus, it is in a position, to not only cater to current market demands and anticipate future ones, but to help shape that future. PC-Telephone is a powerful communications software application that makes possible to use your computer as a regular ISDN telephone, Internet telephone, fax machine, voicemail client, answer phone and much more. In fact, PC-Telephone possess all the available services on the telecommunications market - Call Answer, Call Forwarding, Call Transfer, Call Scheduling, Call Accounting, Call Waiting, Call Hold, Call Recording, Caller ID CLIP/CLIR, Audio Conferencing, etc. PC-Telephone is the first software application that integrates the regular Computer Telephony and Internet Telephony (Voice over IP) in a single user interface.
